events.message: I am filing a claim due to a car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another on the highway.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as the policy covers vehicle damages and collision incidents.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the claim process related to your car accident.
We have received your claim and acknowledge the report of the vehicle accident that happened yesterday evening.
Please submit all relevant documents including the police report, photos of the damage, and your vehicle registration.
All requested documents such as the accident report, photographs, and insurance papers have been uploaded to your claim file.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the circumstances and evidence surrounding your vehicle collision claim.
The investigation into the auto accident has concluded with sufficient evidence to proceed with claim settlement.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy terms of your car insurance.
You have provided positive feedback on the claims process and the proposed settlement offer regarding your auto accident.
Your claim has been formally approved following review of all documentation and investigation findings.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued and transferred to your provided bank account.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed as all the settlement payments and procedures are complete.
Your auto accident claim records have been archived for future reference and documentation purposes.
